Posts.Content: Sep 22, 2007 06:27AM JoanofArdmore wrote: Oh Shelli, Oh Shelli.I cant believe you are gone.I cant believe you're not going to turn a corner, get better. I know you ARE better now.You're not hurtin' any more, and the place where you are is (really) Paradise.And your pain and fear is over. Ah, but we have to live without you here.And without the hope of you "coming back". I'm crying bigtime.I'm so, so sorry to lose you, Shelli.So young, so beautiful, so brave.God bless and hold you close, and may he watch over your loving family. With prayers and tears, joan
Posts.Title: Shelli is an angel geeta75 Sige
